Hey, I'm Ziwei Gu

I am a Master of Engineering student at Cornell University. I graduated with a B.A in Mathematics and Computer Science from Cornell University in December 2020.
Research Interests: Machine Learning, Data Mining, Algorithm Fairness, and Human-Computer Interaction.
